name: Cursed Laser
description:
A small twin-stick shooter with a twist - an enemy spawns at the point at which the lasers you shoot end. You must shoot multiple enemies at once to cut their numbers down, and use the mirrors scattered around the map to combo more enemies together.

- WASD / LS to move

- Space / Shift / LB / RB to dash through enemies

- LMB / RT to shoot your laser and spawn an enemy
